title: Subpart  - Law Firms and Associations
content:
Subpart  - Law Firms and Associations

State Regulations
§ 1200.5.1 - Responsibilities of law firms, partners, managers and supervisory lawyers
§ 1200.5.2 - Responsibilities of a subordinate lawyer
§ 1200.5.3 - Lawyer's responsibility for conduct of nonlawyers
§ 1200.5.4 - Professional independence of a lawyer
§ 1200.5.5 - Unauthorized practice of law
§ 1200.5.6 - Restrictions on right to practice
§ 1200.5.7 - Responsibilities regarding nonlegal services
§ 1200.5.8 - Contractual relationship between lawyers and nonlegal professionals

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
